abstract.p: Effect of take-off from prosthetic versus intact limb on transtibial amputee long jump technique by Nolan et al. Prosthetics and Orthotics International 36(3): 297-305, DOI: 10.1177/0309364612448877.

body.p: For the above article the following Funding and Acknowledgment information was not included:

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: This study was funded by CIF (Centre for Sport Research, Stockholm, Sweden) and The Swedish School of Sport and Health Sciences, GIH, Stockholm, and was approved and supported by the International Paralympic Committee.

sec.title: Acknowledgements
sec.p: The authors would like to thank Morgan Nolan for help with data collection.
The publisher apologizes for this error
